snippet: High school friends of Denise J. Thurman remember her as a bright, pretty cheerleader with long auburn hair.     ''I always thought she had everything,'' said Shirley Whitman, an acquaintance who recalled watching Ms. Thurman and the other cheerle...
lead_paragraph: High school friends of Denise J. Thurman remember her as a bright, pretty cheerleader with long auburn hair. ''I always thought she had everything,'' said Shirley Whitman, an acquaintance who recalled watching Ms. Thurman and the other cheerleaders practice. ''I was always a little envious and wanted to be just like her.''
abstract: Friends recall Denise J Thurman, member of Heaven's Gate cult who was among 39 members of group who died in mass suicide in California; photo (M)

headline.main: From Cheerleader to Cult Member: a Long Island Woman Cut Her Ties to Home
headline.kicker: DEATH IN A CULT: THE CONVERT
